description.value: Primary Energy: Negative 2 (imposing your will through compulsion) Supporting Energy: Space 1 (close range) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 3 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Negative Potential + Negative Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within close range. Target makes [[/save type=will]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, target follows the command on their next turn. Commands: Approach, Drop, Flee, Grovel (prone), Halt (no actions). Cannot command self-harm. Creatures immune to charm are immune. Saving Throw: Will (to resist compulsion) Success Scaling: 0-1 = resists, 2 = follows command for 1 round, 3 = follows for 2 rounds, 4 = affects 2 targets instead, 5 = command lasts 1 minute
